tag.description: Column is an extended version of the standard column used by various components like datatable, treetable and more.

attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Valeur sur laquelle sera base le tri
attribute.name: order

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Property to be used for sorting.
attribute.name: sortBy

attribute.description: Inline style of the column.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the column.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Property to be used for filtering.
attribute.name: filterBy

attribute.description: Inline style of the filter element.
attribute.name: filterStyle

attribute.description: Style class of the filter element.
attribute.name: filterStyleClass

attribute.description: Shortcut for header facet.
attribute.name: headerText

attribute.description: Shortcut for footer facet.
attribute.name: footerText

attribute.description: Enables selection mode, valid values are "single" and "multiple".
attribute.name: selectionMode

attribute.description: Disables row selection when true.
attribute.name: disabledSelection

attribute.description: Specifies resizable feature at column level. Datatable's resizableColumns must be enabled to use this option.
attribute.name: resizable

attribute.description: Defines if the column should be exported by dataexporter.
attribute.name: exportable

attribute.description: Value of the filter field.
attribute.name: filterValue

attribute.description: Width of the column in pixels or percentage.
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Defines if panel is toggleable by columnToggler component. Default value is true and a false value marks the column as static.
attribute.name: toggleable

attribute.description: Custom implementation to filter a value against a constraint.
attribute.name: filterFunction

attribute.description: Name of the field to pass lazy load method for filtering and sorting. If not specified, filterBy-sortBy values are used to identify the field name.

attribute.description: Boolean value to mark column as sortable.

attribute.description: Boolean value to mark column as filterable.
attribute.name: filterable

attribute.description: Controls the visibilty of the column, default is true.
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: Whether clicking the column selects the row when datatable has row selection enabled, default is true.
attribute.name: selectRow

attribute.description: Identifiant unique du composant
attribute.name: uid

tag.description: DataTable is an enhanced version of the standard Datatable that provides built-in solutions to many commons use cases like paging, sorting, selection, lazy loading, filtering and more.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Datasource of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Name of the iterator variable used to refer each data.
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: Number of rows to display per page. Default value is 0 meaning to display all data available.
attribute.name: rows

attribute.description: Makes data scrollable with fixed header. Default is false.
attribute.name: scrollable

attribute.description: Height for scrollable data.
attribute.name: scrollHeight

attribute.description: Width for scrollable data.
attribute.name: scrollWidth

attribute.description: Enables data selection, valid values are "single" and "multiple".
attribute.name: selectionMode

attribute.description: Reference to the selection data.
attribute.name: selection

attribute.description: Name of iterator to refer each row index.
attribute.name: rowIndexVar

attribute.description: Style class of the main container.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Decides whether datatable columns are resizable or not.
attribute.name: resizableColumns

attribute.description: Property to be used for default sorting.
attribute.name: sortBy

attribute.description: Sets sorting order. Default is "ascending"
attribute.name: sortOrder

attribute.description: Unique identifier of row data.
attribute.name: rowKey

attribute.description: Client side event to invoke datatable filtering for input fields. Default is keyup.
attribute.name: filterEvent

attribute.description: Delay to wait in milliseconds before sending each filter query. Default is 300.
attribute.name: filterDelay

attribute.description: Decides whether datatable columns can be reordered using dragdrop.
attribute.name: draggableColumns

attribute.description: Defines sorting mode, valid values are "single" (default) and "multiple".
attribute.name: sortMode

attribute.description: Number of rows to freeze starting from the beginning.
attribute.name: frozenRows

attribute.description: Disables row selection when true.
attribute.name: disabledSelection

attribute.description: Defines row select mode for checkbox based selection, valid values are new (default), add and checkbox.
attribute.name: rowSelectMode

attribute.description: Number of columns to freeze, default is 0.
attribute.name: frozenColumns

attribute.description: Case sensitivity for sorting, insensitive by default.
attribute.name: caseSensitiveSort

attribute.description: Disables text selection on row click. Default is true.
attribute.name: disabledTextSelection

attribute.description: Defines where the null values are placed in ascending sort order. Default value is "1" meaning null values are placed at the end in ascending mode and at beginning in descending mode. Set to "-1" for the opposite behavior.
attribute.name: nullSortOrder

attribute.description: Adds hover effect to rows, default is false. Hover is always on when selection is enabled.
attribute.name: rowHover
